SEARCH

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class. This class is used to represent a player's state. The player should know what rooms they have visited and are in, along with the items they are carrying.
Version:
11.4.25
Author:
Matt Witham

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()

  • Method Details

    • goBack

      public void goBack()
      Method to help with the 'back' command of the game. Uses a stack to back-pedal rooms unless there are no previous rooms visited.

    • moveRooms

      public void moveRooms(Room nextRoom)
      Method to help with moving the player. Grabs the next room, checks if it is locked / null. If not, pushes the current room on the stack and defines the new current room.
      Parameters:
      nextRoom - The room that the player will be entering.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item)
      Adds an item to the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be added.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Item item)
      Removes an item from the players inventory. NOTE: If the item is the one ring, and the player is in Mt. Doom, the game's ending will trigger.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to remove from the player's inventory.

    • findItem

      public Item findItem(String itemDescription)
      Finds an item in the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      itemDescription - The description of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      The found item, or null if the player does not have it.

    • findItemById

      public Item findItemById(ItemLabel id)
      Finds an item in the player's inventory based off id.
      Parameters:
      id - The ItemLabel of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      The Item object with that id.

    • getCurrentRoom

      public Room getCurrentRoom()
      Returns the current room that the player is in.
      Returns:
      The current room that the player is in.

    • setCurrentRoom

      public void setCurrentRoom(Room room)
      Sets the players current room.
      Parameters:
      room - The room that the player is currently in.

    • getPlayerItems

      public List<Item> getPlayerItems()
      Returns a list of all the items in a players inventory.
      Returns:
      The list of the items that the player currently has.

    • getInventoryItems

      public String getInventoryItems()
      Helper method for the inventory command. Prints out the description of each item that the player is currently holding.
      Returns:
      The string representation of all items held by the player.

    • isHeroic

      public boolean isHeroic()
      Returns the current heroic state of the player. If the player drops the ring in Mt. Doom, they are heroic and will trigger the end of the game.
      Returns:
      The heroic status of the player.
